author: sky.cactus
content: <@606706391809392650> <https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1559> See the code, which actually calls the variables `xPerGas` to be explicitly clear.  People often shorthand that in casual conversation is all.

author: jnftfi
content: Greetings all, we just open-sourced a python (cadCAD) based Ethereum Economic Model that we built in collaboration with the Ethereum Robust Incentives Group, and that was funded by the EF ESP. The following tweet has most info. In case there would be interest, we are happy to answer questions of researchers intending to use the model, or to do private onboarding sessions. We hope it will be useful to the community.
